titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at VVhite-hall, on the 24. of March, 1621 Beeing the day of the beginning of his Maiesties most gracious reigne. By the Bishop of S. Dauids.
titleStmt.author: Laud, William, 1573-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: The Bishop of S. Dauids = William Laud.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
